data.name: Portal Versus
data.detailed_description:
About Portal Versus

Portal Versus brings Player vs Player action to Portal 2.

With a variety of new game modes and challenges, find out who's the best at wielding the portal gun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / Vista / XP
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz P4, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher) or AMD64X2 (or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must have 128 MB of memory available or more and with support for Pixel Shader 2.0b (ATI Radeon X800 or higher / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or higher / Intel HD Graphics 2000 or higher).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6300 (or higher) or Ryzen 5 (or higher)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 Ti or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
